channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Knatchbull Road is quite dirty, 13th August
item.description:
Sad to report, we have not seen the street cleaner on Knatchbull Road. We have seen the street cleaners with push bins on other streets but we have not seen the street cleaning on Knatchbull for a couple weeks now. For three weeks I've walked by the same rubbish on the street, nothing has been touched. This occurs all along Knatchbull Road from 1 A through 30. A kind cleaner from another street said he could clean to cover the work but was disallowed. It would be nice to prevent a potential rodent problem to keep the neighborhood clean from rubbish. Thank you for taking the time to address this issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 49, Knatchbull Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping near 1 Chelmer Road, 13th August
item.description:
Barbecue and domestic bins dumped outside our property. This rubbish is not from our property, we have bin storage (which in the photo) and use the area where fly tipping has happened to place our bins and recycling on collection day only.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chelmer Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Tree growth rubbing against telephone wire, 13th August
item.description:
Part of the tree outside 12 and 13 Melvin Road is tall enough now that when it is windy it rubs against the telephone wires. Also one of the branches hangs over no. 13 front garden which I would like cut back please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Melvin Road, Anerley, London

item.title: Blocked drain. Sewage smells, 13th August
item.description:
This drain has been blocked for months and there has been sewage smells. Neither Thames Water or the Council are taking ownership of this issue and I am concerned about sewage overflow.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lea Bridge Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 45cm x 30cm pot hole. 6 cm deep, 13th August
item.description:
The pot hole was 5 m in diameter 6 months ago when they repaired a pot hole 4 cm from the one I'm reporting . This pothole is now encroaching on the previous repaired pothole. Don't these contractors have any common sense , or they probably get paid per pothole and this one wasn't on the list.

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Advertising signs, 13th August
item.description:
On Shooters Hill number 157 they have had builders in to put in block paving over front garden. After they finished 3 large signs were put up for the builders Platinum. 1. outside 157 Shooters Hill, 2. opposite junction of Shooters Hill with Shrewsbury Ln 3. opposite junction of Shooters Hill with Donaldson Rd. Two signs are attached to lamp posts which I think must be illegal or against RG by laws. I've attached pics of the three signs, If RG take this further I would be very please to support the prosecution of Platinum.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shooters Hill, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken light causing buzzing noise at night, 13th August
item.description:
There is a broken light managed by the Council on the side of our house on Keeton's Estate. We are an end of terrace on Keeton's road just beside an alleyway into the back of the estate. The light is flickering on and off during the night causing an intermittent buzzing noise as if someone is pushing a buzzer, and it is very loud and disrupting our sleep. There are two lights on the side of the house - the one causing the issue is the one closest to Keeton's Road and the front of the house.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, Keeton's Road, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Fridge and Multiple bags of rubbish, 13th August
item.description:
Again I am reporting a new issue with fly tipping. From the corner of Melvin Road and Croydon Road, Penge and along the back fence of the empty Croydon Road property there is a fridge and a few bags of different types of rubbish as shown in my photo. While I am reporting the fly tipping I would also like to report all the dogs mess along Melvin Road’s footpath. If there was a camera fitted it would catch the fly tipper and the owner that lets their dog mess on the pavement and residences front garden.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Melvin Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet
